content: materials - 1 2 2 skeins of purl soho s linen quill worsted 1 50% fine highland wool 35% alpaca and 15% linen each skein is 164 yards/ 100 grams approximately 118 206 293 yards required - us 5 3 75 mm 16-inch circular needles 3 or 12-inch for smallest size - a set of us 5 double pointed needles 4 - 4 stitch markers 5 including one unique marker gauge 34 stitches and 26 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes toddler/kid small kid large/adult small adult large to fit actual head size of 14 to 16¼ 19 to 22 23½ to 27¼ inches - finished circumference unstretched 10¾ 14¼ 17¾ inches - finished height 7¾ 11 12¼ inches originally designed by purl soho designer laura ferguson 6 1 https //www purlsoho com/linen-quill-worsted 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/laura-ferguson-for-purl-soho/
